thread.title: Spot flooding and isolated thunderstorms possible in Donegal today
thread.title_full: Spot flooding and isolated thunderstorms possible in Donegal today

author: Staff Reporter
title: Spot flooding and isolated thunderstorms possible in Donegal today
text:
Wet and blustery start with longer spells of rain in Donegal today, heavy at times.
Occasional heavy showers will move in behind from the early afternoon, with spot flooding and isolated thunderstorms possible. Highest temperatures of 15 to 17 degrees in moderate to fresh southwesterly winds. Gusty at times on or near Atlantic coasts.
Mostly cloudy tonight with scattered showers, heavy at times, then tonight. Lowest temperatures of 11 to 13 degrees in moderate to fresh west to southwest winds.
Friday will be cloudy with scattered showers, some heavy at times, with brighter spells breaking through in between the showers. Highest temperatures of 15 to 19 degrees, feeling coolest on west Atlantic coasts, in moderate westerly winds.
